TEXT.S: Oman Itini i 21 00 N, 57 00 E, noAsiya ko Oman. Polong no sekalay i 309,500 sq km "saka 71 ko rayray no ngangan. " "O sekalay no sera i, 309,500 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 0 sq km " Polong i 3,355,262 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 4.70 , Malo no kilakilangan a sera 0 , malo no roma to a sera 95.30 . siyoto O [[[Muscat]] ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakacecay ko safaw 18 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Qaboos bin Said al Said, patirengan a romi'ad i 1970 a miheca saka 7 folad saka 23 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA List of current heads of state and government
